author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30
text:
March 26 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Emerging Markets Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News
U.S. Federal Reserve
Today in Washington - This Diary is filed daily. - MONDAY, MARCH 26 ** ACCRA - Bank of Ghana announces policy rate decision - 1100 GMT. CAPE TOWN - South Africa Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to March 28).
TUESDAY, MARCH 27 BRATISLAVA – National Bank of Slovakia Governor Jozef Makuch holds a news conference - 1100 GMT. BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the Investment Implementation Summit – 0045 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy meeting. No interest rate announcement is expected.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 28 BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, MARCH 29 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meetings to announce interest rates. CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt monetary policy committee meeting. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank monetary policy meeting.
MONDAY, APRIL 2 DULUTH, United States - Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari speaks on the economy and monetary policy before a student town hall hosted by the University of Minnesota at Duluth, Minnesota – 2200 GMT. TUESDAY, APRIL 3
DULUTH, United States - Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari participates in a moderated question-and-answer session at the Regional Economic Indicators Forum - 1330 GMT.
SINGAPORE – Singapore hosts the ASEAN finance ministers and central bank governors’ meetings – (to April 6) SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia holds interest rate meeting – 0430 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 4 BUCHAREST - National Bank of Romania Board meeting on monetary policy issues. TIRANA – Bank of Albania’s Financial Stability Report 2017 H2. COLOMBO - Central Bank of Sri Lanka monetary policy report.
FRIDAY, APRIL 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its March 2018 monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 5 SINGAPORE - 22nd ASEAN Finance Ministers’ Meeting (to April 6). TUESDAY, APRIL 10 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (to April 11). BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 11 BUCHAREST - National Bank of Romania holds minutes of the April 4 Board meeting on monetary policy issues. WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia holds Monetary Policy Meeting. PERTH - Speech by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the Australia-Israel Chamber of Commerce (WA), Perth - 0345 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its March 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 12 LIMA – Central bank of Peru announces interest rate decision. SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds a monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement.
FRIDAY, APRIL 13 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Financial Stability Review – 0130 GMT.
KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting.
MONDAY, APRIL 16 KAMPALA - Bank of Uganda announces interest rate decision. JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision. BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina holds press conference on monetary policy report.
TUESDAY, APRIL 17 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0130 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 18 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting. (to April 19).
TUESDAY, APRIL 24 BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 25 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (no interest rate announcement). ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 26 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meets to announce interest rates.
CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova announces interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, APRIL 27 MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland release the minutes of its monitory policy meeting.
MONDAY, APRIL 30 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey releases minutes of its April monetary policy committee meeting.
